item.description:
EVENT: Lilac Sunday is a special day at the Arboretum as the lilacs come in bloom, and we are going to take part in this Annual tradition with a walk around the park that will include tours of the lilacs, dance performances, picnicking (itâ€™s allowed on this special day only). Bring a picnic lunch or buy refreshments. For more information on the Park including directions go to: www.arboretum.harvard.edu

TC: Andrea (anissenbaum@lycos.com) or (617)469-9599 until 9:00pm
RSVP: Required by May 8th, use the address above and include a cell number for contact on the 9th. Andrea will provide more details on the arrangements and where to meet when you RSVP.
MEET: 11:00am at the Arborway Gate. There is limited parking on the side streets. The easiest way to get there is take the Orange Line to the Forest Hills and the Arboretum is just across the street from the Station.
Cost: $5.00 for non-members plus cost of food and refreshments.
item.how_to_find_us: Contact Andrea at: (anissenbaum@lycos.com) for the details

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Lilac Sunday at Arnold Arboretum
